channel.title: Need help about players rights
channel.description:
I would like to make an other players rights on my server
I made 1 : Mod 2 : Admin 3 : Co owner
But i added 4: Owner , in the players.class
Now i made a new crown for owner and co , where can i change the crown for player rights 3 and 4 ? :/
Actually : Admin and co owner have the same cown and owner doesn't have ..
Thanks for reply :)

item.title: Need help about players rights
item.dc:creator: @droidmobile droidmobile@yahoo.com
item.description:
@droidmobile wrote:

if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0){ out.write(7); }else if (playerRights == 3){ if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")){ out.write(5); }else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")){ out.write(8); }else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Beast")){ out.write(6); } else out.write(2); } else if (playerRights == 2){ out.write(2); } else out.write(playerRights); out.write(0); // no log updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) { // error at finalizer means auto destruct no exceptions // -bakatool disconnected = true; destruct(); }
The outwrite are mod/admin crowns, match yours with usernames.

Read full topic
